# wcs-skeleton-text



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

Use a skeleton text as a placeholder for titles or paragraphs.

## Properties

| Property    | Attribute   | Description                                    | Type                                          | Default   |
| ----------- | ----------- | ---------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------- | --------- |
| `animation` | `animation` | Specifies the animation of the skeleton        | `"glide" \| "none" \| "pulse"`                | `'glide'` |
| `height`    | `height`    | Specifies the line height of the text skeleton | `"body" \| "caption" \| "h1" \| "h2" \| "h3"` | `'body'`  |


----------------------------------------------

*Built with [StencilJS](https://stenciljs.com/)*
